# cmccloudv2_autoscalingv2_group (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# create autoscale group do not using Load Balancer
resource "cmccloudv2_autoscalingv2_group" "as_group_1" { 
    name             = "as-group-no-lb"
    zone             = "AZ1"
    min_size         = 1
    max_size         = 1
    desired_capacity = 1
    configuration_id = "9b398fb0-395b-459b-8531-c7ee41e15d30"
	
	scale_up_adjustment_type = "change_in_capacity"
	scale_up_adjustment      = 2
	scale_up_cooldown        = 400
	
	scale_down_adjustment_type = "change_in_capacity"
	scale_down_adjustment      = 1
	scale_down_cooldown        = 400
}  

# create autoscale group using Load Balancer
resource "cmccloudv2_autoscalingv2_group" "as_group_1" { 
	name             = "as-group-vjw2"
	zone             = "AZ1"
	min_size         = 1
	max_size         = 1
	desired_capacity = 1
	configuration_id = "9b398fb0-395b-459b-8531-c7ee41e15d30"
	cooldown         = 600
	
	scale_up_adjustment_type = "change_in_capacity"
	scale_up_adjustment      = 2
	scale_up_cooldown        = 400
	
	scale_down_adjustment_type = "change_in_capacity"
	scale_down_adjustment      = 1
	scale_down_cooldown        = 400
	
	lb_pool_id       = "0e34fbc9-7ab8-4386-a3b9-ab2c1508330f"
	lb_protocol_port = 80
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `configuration_id` (String) The ID of the autoscaling configuration
- `desired_capacity` (Number) The desired number of servers in the autoscaling group
- `max_size` (Number) The maximum number of servers in the autoscaling group
- `min_size` (Number) The minimum number of servers in the autoscaling group
- `name` (String) The name of the autoscaling group
- `zone` (String) List of zones, separated by commas, example: `AZ1,AZ2,AZ3`

### Optional

- `cooldown` (Number) Cooldown time in seconds between scaling actions.
- `lb_pool_id` (String) The ID of the load balancer pool
- `lb_protocol_port` (Number) The protocol port of the load balancer pool
- `scale_down_adjustment` (Number) Value to adjust for scale-down.
- `scale_down_adjustment_type` (String) Type of scaling adjustment for scale-down.
- `scale_down_cooldown` (Number) Cooldown period after scale-down in seconds.
- `scale_up_adjustment` (Number) Value to adjust for scale-up.
- `scale_up_adjustment_type` (String) Type of scaling adjustment for scale-up.
- `scale_up_cooldown` (Number) Cooldown period after scale-up in seconds.
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `created` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `status` (String)
- `status_reason` (String)

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
